name: Reverie of Remembrance
description:
Dark and beautiful short AVG

The girl Rivera finds herself in a beautiful snowy mansion.
I heard that this place is "Purgatorium" between life and death.
Everyone who drifted here had no memory other than their names.

In order to find the cause of each death, they set sail into the depths of their memories...

*R15 (due to sexual and cruel expressions)

  • Only the main event has voice.
    (Voice ON/OFF can be switched at any time)

*RPG Maker VX Ace RTP packed
